# Dimples Cosmetics - Premium Skincare & Beauty Products Tanzania
# https://www.dimplescosmetics.com

# About Us
Dimples Cosmetics is Tanzania's leading premium beauty and skincare company, established over 10 years ago. We serve 2.1 million+ happy clients across Tanzania and East Africa with our flagship brand La Purrona and other premium skincare lines.

# Our CEO
Hilda David Nnko - Young CEO of the Year 2025, leading Dimples Cosmetics to become East Africa's fastest-growing cosmetics brand.

# Awards & Recognition
- Best Cosmetics Brand of the Year 2025
- East Africa's Fastest Growing Cosmetics Brand 2025
- Young CEO of the Year 2025 (Hilda Nnko)
- Consumer Choice Top Cosmetics Brand 2025

# Our Flagship Brand: La Purrona
La Purrona is our most popular and award-winning skincare line featuring 25+ premium products including:
- Face creams (whitening, anti-acne, moisturizing)
- Body creams (Rose, Lavender, Strawberry, Lemon, Chocolate variants in 300g & 500g)
- Serums (Niacinamide, Retinol, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Super Whitening)
- Cleansers (Amino Acid Facial Cleanser, Potato Deep Cleanser)
- Clay masks, scrubs, toners, soaps, and body therapy products
- Hair removal cream, hand cream, deodorant, sunscreen SPF 50+

# Product Benefits
La Purrona products offer intense hydration, brightening, anti-aging, acne treatment, and skin nourishment with premium natural ingredients.

# Store Locations in Tanzania
1. Mikocheni - Dar es Salaam: Plot 81 Block E, Along Alykhan Road
2. Kijitonyama - Dar es Salaam: Urambo Street, Opposite Global Pub
3. Arusha: Majengo Mapya Road, Opposite Vodacom Office
4. Zanzibar: Maisara Street, Stone Town
